document.full_text: former gov. arnold schwarzenegger is putting his acting career on pause amid the news that he had fathered a child with a former member of his household staff.
document.title: west: california: schwarzenegger postpones return to film
lines_and_colors: former gov. arnold schwarzenegger is putting his acting career on pause amid the news that he had fathered a child with a former member of his household staff.
